thread.title: BRIEF-AbbVie and International Myeloma Foundation Partner To Study Role Of Genetic Mutation

title: BRIEF-AbbVie and International Myeloma Foundation Partner To Study Role Of Genetic Mutation

organizations.name: international myeloma foundation partner to study role of genetic mutation march
study role of genetic mutation reuters staff

text: March 21, 2018 / 1:11 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-AbbVie and International Myeloma Foundation Partner To Study Role Of Genetic Mutation Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 21 (Reuters) - AbbVie Inc: * ABBVIE AND THE INTERNATIONAL MYELOMA FOUNDATION ANNOUNCE PARTNERSHIP TO STUDY THE ROLE OF A GENETIC MUTATION IN OUTCOMES OF PATIENTS WITH MULTIPLE MYELOMA * ABBVIE INC - ‍STUDY WILL ASSESS OUTCOMES FROM 1,500 PATIENTS WITH MM AND T(11;14) TRANSLOCATION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
